description:
# DAppNode Raiden Wizard

To start this package you need to provide an Ethereum keystore file.

[Use the Raiden Wizard](https://docs.raiden.network/installation/quick-start/download-and-run-the-raiden-wizard) to generate a JSON file and fund it!

keystore.title: Raiden Keystore file
keystore.description: Your Keystore/JSON file containing the key that you want to use for this node

rpc-endpoint.title: RPC Endpoint
rpc-endpoint.description: Raiden will use your local Ethereum node by default.

network-id.title: RPC Endpoint
network-id.description: Raiden will use your local Ethereum node by default.
